description.name: Forstner drill bit & plug cutter set 20mm
description.long_desc:
Set of Forstner and plug cutter designed for wood-working. The Forstner cutter enables to remove knots and other defects in the wood. 


Manufactured from high-quality HCS steel, which is used in the processing of wood, wood materials and plastics. The plug cutter is designed to make tenons of the same diameter as the hole made with a Forstner cutter


Product features:



  • the set includes Forstner and plug cutter both of 35mm diameter z

  • manufactured from HCS steel

  • The Forstner cutter perfect for removing knots and other defects in the wood. 

  • The plug cutter is designed to make tenons of the same diameter as the hole made with a Forstner cutter

category.name: Rotary Files for Metal, Milling Cutters
category.path: Cutting Tools\Drilling\Drills for Metal\Rotary Files for Metal, Milling Cutters

category_idosell.path: Cutting Tools\Drilling\Drills for Metal\Rotary Files for Metal, Milling Cutters

description.name: Cylindrical - rounded end milling cutter 6mm (tungsten carbide 10x20mm)
description.long_desc:
Wysokiej jakości pilnik obrotowy wykonany z węglika wolframu, który charakteryzuje się bardzo dużą twardością oraz odpornością na ścieranie.

Pilniki obrotowe w ostatnich latach stały się bardzo popularne, mają szerokie zastosowanie w przemyśle motoryzacyjnym, lotniczym, stoczniowym oraz wszędzie tam gdzie konieczne jest szybkie usunięcie nadmiaru spoin spawalniczych, wlewek powstały podczas procesu odlewania.

Niezastąpione podczas fazowania, usuwania zadziorów oraz miejsc korozji.

Charakterystyka:

  • pilnik o geometrii walca z zaokrągloną główką
  • wykonany z wysokiej jakości węglika wolframu
  • bardzo duża twardość oraz odporność na ścieranie przez co może być stosowany przy pracy ze stalą hartowaną

Specyfikacja techniczna:

Materiał wykonania: węglik wolframu

Geometria: walec z zaokrągloną główką

Uzębienie: na przemian skośne

Średnica części roboczej: 10 mm

Długość części roboczej: 20 mm

Zastosowanie:

  • Wygładzanie spoin i spawów
  • Usuwanie zadziorów
  • Łamanie krawędzi i wyrównywanie płaszczyzn
  • Fazowanie i usuwanie korozji

description.short_desc:
Wysokiej jakości pilnik obrotowy wykonany z węglika wolframu, który charakteryzuje się bardzo dużą twardością oraz odpornością na ścieranie.

Pilniki obrotowe w ostatnich latach stały się bardzo popularne, mają szerokie zastosowanie w przemyśle motoryzacyjnym, lotniczym, stoczniowym oraz wszędzie tam gdzie konieczne jest szybkie usunięcie nadmiaru spoin spawalniczych, wlewek powstały podczas procesu odlewania.

Niezastąpione podczas fazowania, usuwania zadziorów oraz miejsc korozji.

Charakterystyka:

  • pilnik o geometrii kulistej
  • wykonany z wysokiej jakości węglika wolframu
  • bardzo duża twardość oraz odporność na ścieranie przez co może być stosowany przy pracy ze stalą hartowaną

Specyfikacja techniczna:

Materiał wykonania: węglik wolframu

Geometria: kulisty

Uzębienie: na przemian skośne

Średnica części roboczej: 12 mm

Długość części roboczej: 11 mm

Zastosowanie:

  • Wygładzanie spoin i spawów
  • Usuwanie zadziorów
  • Łamanie krawędzi i wyrównywanie płaszczyzn
  • Fazowanie i usuwanie korozji

category.name: Angle Grinders
category.path: Power Tools\Angle Grinders and Metal Processing\Angle Grinders

category_idosell.path: Power Tools\Angle Grinders and Metal Processing\Angle Grinders

description.name: Dust cover for grinder 115 and 125mm
description.long_desc:
Dust cover - wall chaser for angle grinders with a disc diameter of 115 and 125 mm. Equipped with two small wheels for more effective, accurate and comfortable work.


Product Features


  • Depth adjustement: 6 / 10 / 15 / 20 / 25 / 28 mm

  • Could be used with discs with a diameter of 115 and 125 mm

  • Adapters and a special mounting clamp allow the assembly of 2 to 4 discs at any distance from each other thanks to 5, 6, 7 and 8 mm wide spacers

  • Spindle collar diameter: 47 mm

  • The mounting reductions included in the set allow you to work with the majority of angle grinders available on the market

  • Adapter sizes: 38, 40, 41, 42, 43, 48 mm

  • Rubber adapter fits pipes with an inner diameter of 28 / 34 / 37 mm


    • Kit Contents



    • Dust cover with wheels

    • 6 reduction adapters

    • Sleeves for mounting discs with 4 spacers

    • Mounting key for angle grinder

    • H5 Allen key

    • Screw-in handle for guiding the wall chaser

    • Rubber adapter for the vacuum cleaner

description.name: Sds plus adapters for sockets 3pcs
description.long_desc:
Set of SDS-Plus adapters for drill bits 3 pcs


Adapters are manufactured from durable chrome-vanadium steel (CrV). The adapter set allows the use of 1/2", 3/8" and 1/4" sockets with a drill with an SDS-Plus chuck.


Product features:
manufactured from  chrome vanadium (CrV) tool steel
carefully and precisely made
SDS-Plus fixing
allows the use of 1/2", 3/8" and 1/4" sockets


Technical Specifications:


Material: chrome vanadium (CrV) tool steel


Fixing: SDS-Plus


Socket sizes: 1/2", 3/8", 1/4"

description.name: Pistol for inflating wheels with digital pressure gauge
description.long_desc:
Professional pneumatic gun with LCD pressure gauge - for inflating car and truck wheels. Equipped with a flexible 30 cm long hose and a large, easy-to-read pressure gauge with an LCD display in a rubber cover that protects against shocks and impacts. Measuring scale in four units - Psi, Bar, kPa, Kg/cm2. The 1/4" quick coupler allows for quick connection to the compressor.


Product features:



light and handy
large readable manometer with LCD display
scale 0 - 12 bar / 0 - 170 psi / 0 - 1200 kPa / 0 - 12.23 Kg/cm2
hose length 30 cm
metal body
equipped with a button for releasing air
rubber cover of the pressure gauge to protect against shocks and impacts
1/4" quick coupler
pressure gauge powered by two AAA batteries (not included)


Technical Specifications:


Gauge diameter: 63 mm


Hose length: 30 cm


Maximum pressure: 12 bar


Measuring scale: 0 - 12 bar / 0 - 170 psi / 0 - 1200 kPa / 0 - 12.23 Kg/cm2

description.name: Professional tire inflation gun 0-12bar with a pressure gauge
description.long_desc:
Professional pneumatic gun with a large pressure gauge - for inflating car and truck tires. Equipped with a flexible hose with a length of 95 cm and a large readable pressure gauge with a diameter of 80 mm in a rubber cover that protects against shocks and impacts. Measuring scale in two units - Psi, Bar. The 1/4" quick coupler allows for quick connection to the compressor.


Product features:



  • lightweight and handy

  • large, easy-to-read manometer with a diameter of 80 mm

  • scale 0 - 12 bar / 0 - 170 psi

  • hose length 95 cm

  • metal body covered with a thick layer of rubber

  • rubber cover of the pressure gauge to protect against shocks and impacts

  • 1/4" quick coupler


Technical data:


Gauge diameter: 80 mm


Hose length: 95 cm


Maximum pressure: 12 bar


Measurement scale: 0 - 12 bar / 0 - 170 psi

description.name: Booster clamps 600A
description.long_desc:
Kleszczowe zaciski akumulatorowe „krokodylki”, przystosowane do prądu o natężeniu nie przekraczającym 600A. Przeznaczone do stosowania w kablach rozruchowych, prostownikach samochodowych itp. Mocna sprężyna zacisków gwarantuje dobre połączenie elektryczne.

Specyfikacja techniczna:

Maksymalne natężenie prądu: 600A

w komplecie 2 szt (+ czerwony; - czarny)

description.name: Professional tire inflation gun 0-18bar with a digital LED pressure gauge
description.long_desc:
Professional pneumatic gun with LCD pressure gauge - for inflating car and truck wheels. Equipped with a flexible hose with a length of 45 cm and a large readable pressure gauge with an LCD display in a rubber cover that protects against shocks and impacts. Measuring scale in four units - Psi, Bar, kPa, Kg/cm2. The 1/4" quick coupler allows for quick connection to the compressor.


Product features:



  • lightweight and handy

  • large readable manometer with LCD display

  • scale 0 - 18 bar / 0 - 255 psi / 0 - 1800 kPa / 0 - 18 Kg/cm2

  • hose length 45 cm

  • body manufactured from high-quality plastic

  • rubber cover of the pressure gauge to protect against shocks and impacts

  • 1/4" quick coupler

  • pressure gauge powered by two AAA batteries (not included)


Technical data:


Gauge diameter: 66 mm


Hose length: 45 cm


Maximum pressure: 18 bar

  • hose length 45 cm

  • body manufactured from high-quality plastic

  • rubber cover of the pressure gauge to protect against shocks and impacts

  • 1/4" quick coupler

  • pressure gauge powered by two AAA batteries (not included)


Technical data:


Gauge diameter: 66 mm


Hose length: 45 cm


Maximum pressure: 18 bar


Measurement scale: 0 - 18 bar / 0 - 255 psi / 0 - 1800 kPa / 0 - 18 Kg/cm2
description.description:
Professional pneumatic gun with LCD pressure gauge - for inflating car and truck wheels. Equipped with a flexible hose with a length of 45 cm and a large readable pressure gauge with an LCD display in a rubber cover that protects against shocks and impacts. Measuring scale in four units - Psi, Bar, kPa, Kg/cm2. The 1/4" quick coupler allows for quick connection to the compressor.


Product features:



  • lightweight and handy

  • large readable manometer with LCD display

  • scale 0 - 18 bar / 0 - 255 psi / 0 - 1800 kPa / 0 - 18 Kg/cm2

  • hose length 45 cm

  • body manufactured from high-quality plastic

  • rubber cover of the pressure gauge to protect against shocks and impacts

  • 1/4" quick coupler

  • pressure gauge powered by two AAA batteries (not included)


Technical data:


Gauge diameter: 66 mm


Hose length: 45 cm


Maximum pressure: 18 bar


Measurement scale: 0 - 18 bar / 0 - 255 psi / 0 - 1800 kPa / 0 - 18 Kg/cm2

description.name: Set of colored self-tightening ties 600pcs
description.long_desc:
A set of colored cable ties made of high-quality polyamide with high tear resistance and high thermal resistance. Particularly useful when carrying out electrical installations, in order to mark wire harnesses with the appropriate color.


The set includes 600 pieces of cable ties:



  • yellow 100x2mm - 100 pieces

  • blue 100x2.5mm - 100 pieces

  • green 100x2.5mm - 100 pieces

  • red 100x2.5mm - 100 pieces

  • white 150x3.5mm - 100 pieces

  • white 200x4.5mm - 50 pieces

  • black 200x4.5mm - 50 pieces

description.name: Booster clamps 100A
description.long_desc:
Kleszczowe zaciski akumulatorowe „krokodylki”, przystosowane do prądu o natężeniu nie przekraczającym 100A. Przeznaczone do stosowania w kablach rozruchowych, prostownikach samochodowych itp. Mocna sprężyna zacisków gwarantuje dobre połączenie elektryczne.

Specyfikacja techniczna:

Maksymalne natężenie prądu: 100A

w komplecie 2 szt (+ czerwony; - czarny)

description.name: 3in1 stapler + staples set 600pcs
description.long_desc:
The TAKER 3in1 upholstery stapler is a device used to connect various materials with a wooden or wood-like substrate. The design of the stapler allows for quick and effective work thanks to precise tensioning and triggering mechanisms. An incredible advantage of the 3in1 stapler is the ability to work with standard staples 4-14mm, U-type staples 10-12mm, and nails 10-14mm.


A capacious clip allows for long-term work without the need to refill staples. The stapler has an adjustable spring tension and is perfectly balanced, which allows for precise pressing of the face against the material when releasing the trigger.


Product features:

easy to use - just load the clip with staples, put the stapler to the material to be fastened, and press the handle
adjustable staple driving force with a knob
handle lock prevents accidental activation of the stapler
the capacious clip allows for long-term work without the need to refill staples
acceptable sizes of standard staples: 4-14 mm
the allowable size of U-type staples: 10-12 mm
allowable nail size: 10-14 mm

Kit Contents:

3in1 stapler
standard staples 8mm - 200 pcs.
staples type U 12mm - 200 pcs.
nails 12mm - 200 pcs.

description.name: Self-adhesive tool hanger – 1 slot
description.long_desc:
Self-adhesive tool holder designed for attaching garden tools such as rakes, hoes, forks, shovels, etc. Suitable for tools with a shaft diameter of 20-35 mm.


Product features:



  • made of plastic

  • attached to the wall with self-adhesive tape

  • suitable for tools with a shaft diameter of 20-35 mm

  • total height of the handle: 32 mm

  • roller height: 25 mm

description.name: Tool hanger – 1 slot
description.long_desc:
Single-slot tool holder designed for hanging garden tools such as rakes, hoes, forks, shovels, etc. Suitable for tools with a shaft diameter of 20-35 mm.


Product features:
made of steel and rubber
suitable for tools with a shaft diameter of 20-35 mm
total height of the handle: 50 mm
spacing of fixing holes: 38 mm
height of rubber rollers: 25 mm
fixing pins included

description.name: Suction cup 1x125mm 60kg (aluminium)
description.long_desc:
Uchwyt/przyssawka aluminiowa przeznaczona do przenoszenie elementów o płaskiej i gładkiej powierzchni takich jak np. szyby, okna, szyby samochodowe, arkusze blach, laminaty, płytki itp., których waga nie przekracza 60kg.

Wysokiej jakości guma przyssawki aktywowana przez dźwignie zapewnia pewne i bezpieczne przenoszenie elementów.

Korpus uchwytu wykonany z wysokiej jakości stopu aluminium.

Charakterystyka produktu:

  • maksymalny udźwig do 60 kg
  • korpus wykonany z aluminium
  • średnica przyssawki: 125 mm

Specyfikacja techniczna:

Materiał: aluminium, guma

Ilość przyssawek: 1

Maksymalny udźwig: 60 kg

Średnica przyssawek: 125 mm
